agency_name: Department of Rail and Public Transportation
series_description: This series consists of documents recording agency funding and support of the Bay Coast Railroad through either the Rail Preservation Program or the DRPT's Rail Division. This series includes, but is not limited to: applications, correspondence, agreements, contracts and invoices. This series is inactive as 3/9/2023.

agency_name: Department of Rail and Public Transportation
series_description: This series consists of documents recording agency funding and support of the Bay Creej Railroad through either the Rail Preservation Program or the DRPT's Rail Division. This series includes, but is not limited to: applications, correspondence, agreements, contracts and invoices. This series is inactive as 3/9/2023.

agency_name: Department of Rail and Public Transportation
series_description: This series consists of documents recording agency funding and support of the Eastern Shore Railroad through either the Rail Preservation Program or the DRPT's Rail Division. This series includes, but is not limited to: applications, correspondence, agreements, contracts and invoices.

agency_name: Department of Rail and Public Transportation
series_description: Documents This documents funding requests and applications made to various federal agencies to fund Department of Rail and Public Transportation (DRPT) programs, such as the Federal Administration (FRA), Federal Highway Administration and Federal Transit Administration (FTA). This series may include but is not limited to: funding requests, applications, project sheets, and approval documentation.

agency_name: Department of Rail and Public Transportation
series_description: This series documents contractual obligations of the agency federal funding owed to the grantees. This series may include, but is not limited to: signed contracts, agreements, and grant applications.

agency_name: Department of Rail and Public Transportation
series_description: This series consists of the final Compliance Review Report for all transit and rail grantees. This series may include, but is not limited to: final compliance review reports.

agency_name: Department of Rail and Public Transportation
series_description: This series consists of working papers for all transit and rail grantees. This series may include, but is not limited to: drafts compliance review reports, memoranda, data, or other analyses.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Rail and Public Transportation
series_description: This series documents the receipt and approval/disapproval of applications for state and federal grants for public transportation projects and the departmentâ€™s oversight of the project. This series may include, but is not limited to: grants, awards, and other financial assistance documents.

agency_name: Department of Rail and Public Transportation
series_description: This series documents the work conducted by the Rail Division of the DRPT, including projects with the Federal Railroad Administration (FRA), local government, and private businesses. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports, memoranda and official forms and letters for specific projects such as Railroad Quiet Zones, abandonment files, final National Environmental Policy Act (NEPA) documents.
retention_statement: 20 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Rail and Public Transportation
series_description: This series documents various state and federal grant-award programs administered by the DRPT. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, agreements, contract amendments, and invoices.
retention_statement: 20 Years after end of calendar year
